#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;
#define w(t) while(t--)
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define SLL(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define P(x) printf("%d",x)
#define fl(i , a, b) for(i = (int)a; i<(int)b; i++)
#define mem(a , value) memset(a , value , sizeof(a))
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAX 1000000010
#define ll long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
typedef pair<int,int> pp;
int a,  b , p ,q , n, m ; 
int solve(int a , int p )
{
	if(a+p <= n)
		return a+p;  
	if(a<m)
	{
		int d = m - a ; 
		p-= d; 
		a = m ; 
		p = p%(n-m+1);
		a = a + p;
		return a; 
	}
	else
	{
		p = p%(n-m+1);
		if(a+p <= n )
			return a+p ; 
		int d = n - a + 1;
		p-=d;
		a = m ; 
		a+=p;
		return a;
	}
}
int main()
{
	//std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t,s , i ;
	S(t);
	w(t)
	{
		cin>>n>>m>>s>>p>>q;
		if(p==q){
			cout<<s<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		else{
			int cnt =0 ; 
			a =1 ; b = 1;
			fl(i , 0, s)
			{
				a = solve(a , p );
				b= solve(b , q);
				if(a==b){
					cnt++;
				}
			}
			printf("%d\n", cnt);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
